brainstorm.translation[0].definitions[1]: if you have a brainstorm, you are suddenly unable to think clearly or sensibly
I must have had a brainstorm that afternoon.
brainstorm.translation[1].definitions[0]: to have a discussion or meeting with other people at work, to suggest a lot of ideas for an activity or for solving a problem
Employees get together and brainstorm ideas some of which get developed and some don't.
